definitions.definition: ( Roman Catholicism and generally ) An honorary title of the Roman Catholic bishop of Rome as father and head of his church , a sovereign of the Vatican city state .

subdefinitions.definition: ( by extension , now often ironic ) Any similarly absolute and ' infallible ' authority .
( by extension ) Any similar head of a religion .
( uncommon ) A theocrat , a priest-king , including (at first especially) over the imaginary land of Prester John or (now) in figurative and alliterative uses .
( UK ) An effigy of the pope traditionally burnt in Britain on Guy Fawkes' Day and (occasionally) at other times .
( US , obsolete ) Pope Day , the present Guy Fawkes Day .

definitions.definition: ( Coptic Orthodoxy ) An honorary title of the Coptic bishop of Alexandria as father and head of his church .
( Eastern Orthodoxy ) An honorary title of the Orthodox bishop of Alexandria as father and head of his autocephalous church .
( Christianity , historical , obsolete ) Any bishop of the early Christian church .
( British ) The ruffe , a small Eurasian freshwater fish ( Gymnocephalus cernua ); others of its genus .
( UK regional , Cumberland , Cornwall , Devon , Scotland ) The Atlantic puffin ( Fratercula arctica ).
( US regional ) The painted bunting ( Passerina ciris ).
( rare ) The red-cowled cardinal ( Paroaria dominicana ).

main_definition: ( Roman Catholicism and generally ) An honorary title of the Roman Catholic bishop of Rome as father and head of his church , a sovereign of the Vatican city state .
secondary_definitions: ( Coptic Orthodoxy ) An honorary title of the Coptic bishop of Alexandria as father and head of his church .
( Eastern Orthodoxy ) An honorary title of the Orthodox bishop of Alexandria as father and head of his autocephalous church .
( Christianity , historical , obsolete ) Any bishop of the early Christian church .
( British ) The ruffe , a small Eurasian freshwater fish ( Gymnocephalus cernua ); others of its genus .
( UK regional , Cumberland , Cornwall , Devon , Scotland ) The Atlantic puffin ( Fratercula arctica ).
( US regional ) The painted bunting ( Passerina ciris ).
( rare ) The red-cowled cardinal ( Paroaria dominicana ).

definitions.definition: ( alcoholic beverages ) Any mulled wine (traditionally including tokay ) considered similar and superior to bishop .

main_definition: ( alcoholic beverages ) Any mulled wine (traditionally including tokay ) considered similar and superior to bishop .

definitions.definition: ( Russian Orthodoxy ) Alternative form of pop , a Russian Orthodox priest .

main_definition: ( Russian Orthodoxy ) Alternative form of pop , a Russian Orthodox priest .

definitions.definition: The whippoorwill ( Antrostomus vociferus , syn. Caprimulgus vociferus ).

main_definition: ( US , dialectal , obsolete ) The whippoorwill ( Antrostomus vociferus , syn. Caprimulgus vociferus ).
secondary_definitions: ( US , dialectal , rare ) The nighthawk ( Chordeiles minor ).
